ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4

Class GL4RenderWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4.GL4RenderWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Visible, RenderWindow

    public final class GL4RenderWindow
extends java.lang.Object
implements RenderWindow
    A concrete implementation of the render-window interface for a GL4RenderSystem.
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

    • Method Detail

      • createViewport

        public Viewport createViewport(float bottom,
                               float left,
                               float width,
                               float height)
        Description copied from interface: RenderWindow
        Creates a new viewport for this based on the specified dimensions. These dimensions are in screen-space and must be in the [0, 1] range.
        Specified by:
        createViewport in interface RenderWindow
        Parameters:
        bottom - The relative starting position of the viewport's bottom edge, in screen-space.
        left - The relative starting position of the viewport's left edge, in screen-space.
        width - The how far to the right side the viewport's right border extends, in screen-space.
        height - The how far up the viewport's top border extends, in screen-space.

      • getViewport

        public Viewport getViewport(int index)
        Description copied from interface: RenderWindow
        Gets the viewport at the specified index, if it exists.

        Viewports are expected to be stored in the order in which they were created, so that the client can rely on that known order when requesting viewport references.

        Specified by:
        getViewport in interface RenderWindow
        Parameters:
        index - The zero-based index of the viewport.
        Returns:
        The viewport at the indexed position.

      • removeViewport

        public void removeViewport(int index)
        Description copied from interface: RenderWindow
        Removes the viewport at the specified index.

        Implementations are expected to invoke Disposable.notifyDispose() on the viewport.

        Specified by:
        removeViewport in interface RenderWindow
        Parameters:
        index - The position of the viewport to remove.

      • notifyDispose

        public void notifyDispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Explicitly releases the internal resources held by this instance, making it unusable afterwards.

        WARNING: This method is meant to be used internally by the framework and not by game clients. Use directly only if you really know what you're doing.

        Specified by:
        notifyDispose in interface Disposable
